name: Zotrim Slimming Aid 2 X 90S
description: Maté, Guarana and Damiana herbal extract tablets.
Now manage your weight your way.

The primary cause of being overweight is eating more than your body needs. Zotrim® may help reduce overall intake and hence assist weight loss. Having achieved a healthy weight, Zotrim® can help maintain it.
A natural aid to lasting weight loss, with scientific proof.
Working to help you Eat less during meals Snack less between meals.
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Preparation_and_Usage>Food supplements should not be used as a substitute for a varied diet.Recommended for use with healthy diet and exercise programme.Zotrim® - Directions for use.Take 2-3 tablets with a full glass of water or cold drink a few minutes before meals. We recommend you start with 2 tablets before meals and increase to 3 tablets from the second week onwards. Maximum 9 tablets daily. Aim to reduce the portion size for each meal.Anyone who is embarking on a slimming diet, especially if under the age of 18, pregnant, nursing, or has a health problem, should consult their doctor before starting any weight reduction programme.Do not exceed the recommended intake.</Preparation_and_Usage></Cooking_Instructions>
